alert.note: Alert for Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 3:27PM EDT until July 08 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR ROCKLAND COUNTY... At 326 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Monsey, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... New City, Monsey, Nanuet, Suffern, Nyack, Sloatsburg, Pearl River, Orangeburg, Pomona, Upper Nyack, Spring Valley, West Haverstraw, Valley Cottage, Airmont and Congers. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
